title: _livecasino.io_
author: _livecasino.io_
content: Hello dear BitcoinTalk Community!Livecasino.io Promo for this weekend is for 1mBTC Evolution Blackjack Free Chip!!!Livecasino.io BitcoinTalk Promo #17 will work like this:Reward1mBTC Evolution Blackjack Free ChipHow?Opt-in by sending  PM with your livecasino.io username (please use BitcoinTalk promo #17 as PM subject to facilitate the management)Wager at least 1 mBTC on any games on Livecasino.io, including slots!Make at least deposit during campaign periodPromo durationThis Promo will be running from the moment of this post, until Sunday 29th May 23:59 GMTRulesAll BitcoinTalk users can participateThe reward will be credited to the livecasino.io accounts on Monday 30th April, 17:00 GMT Free chip has 1x wagering requirementAll bets and winnings will be withdrawable from the freebetNormal livecasino.io terms and conditions still applyDue to Game Providers country restrictions, some participants may have to receive a different, but equivalent, rewardWe hope you enjoy!Regards,Flávio from livecasino.io team
